bioconda.name: bioconductor-epivizrserver
bioconda.summary: WebSocket server infrastructure for epivizr apps and packages

biotools.summary: This package provides objects to manage WebSocket connections to epiviz apps. Other epivizr package use this infrastructure.

bioschemas.name: epivizrServer
bioschemas.summary: This package provides objects to manage WebSocket connections to epiviz apps. Other epivizr package use this infrastructure.
